value: content=The McKee family live in an exactly replica of the house from the television sitcom, "The Munsters". Visitors are welcome to view and photograph from the gate. Tours of the interior are possible only at their yearly Halloween Bash, the last weekend of October.
directions=From Dallas take I-35E South to Exit 399A, then go west on FM66 1.6 miles. The entrance will be on your left.
price=$21.99 Adult price at the gate

content=Scarborough Renaissance Festival is open on the weekend from the first weekend in April until Memorial Day Monday.  Scarborough Renaissance Festival takes place in Scarborough, England in the year 1533.  There are over 300 different shops selling unique handmade jewelry, clothing, leather goods and other offerings.  Enjoy swordplay, comedy, music and other unique entertainment on 21 stages.  There are also over 100 costumed characters wandering about the streets.  The faire is open no matter what the weather is, and please be advised that the streets turn to mud during a downpour.
, one block north of Historic Town Square. An English-inspired pub. Popular menu items include Coronation Chicken, Reuben sandwich, and of course the fish and chips.
content=An allegedly haunted building with a tumultuous history. Now serves country fried steak and catfish to die for.
